fields.Title: APT / SMOKER ON THE BALCONY
fields.Description: Second meeting with the smoker on the balcony -- he's standing right in front of his apartment door, smoking.

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""That's what I'm aiming for, yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's what I'm aiming for, yes."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I have some good news for you. My..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have some good news for you. My Sunday friend is visiting me tonight. I told him about you and he'd like to say hello. Step in, he's already waiting." He nods towards door #28.

fields.Title: You: ""I found a key hidden under a stone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I found a key hidden under a stone. Was it yours?" (Show him the key.)
fields.Alternate1: "We found a key hidden under a stone. Was it yours?"

fields.Title: hubble telescope
You: ""It made me feel *special*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It made me feel *special*."

fields.Title: You: ""*Very* mysterious.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Very* mysterious."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "His slender figure is backlit by ci..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His slender figure is backlit by city lights, its distant streets and motorways flashing like diamonds...

fields.Title: You: ""By the way, I'm really digging the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By the way, I'm really digging the view here." (Point to the city skyline.)

IsNighttime()
!(IsNighttime())
Jump to: [leave hub]
Electrochemistry: "He's right, only losers go to bed e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's right, only losers go to bed early. Time to break out the booze!

fields.Title: Variable["auto.is_snowing"]
Variable["auto.is_snowing"]
!(Variable["auto.is_snowing"])
Smoker on the Balcony: ""It was mine. My friends use it fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was mine. My friends use it from time to time to visit me." As he looks at you, something sparkles in his eyes.

fields.Title: Empathy: "It feels like a Friday. He seems to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It feels like a Friday. He seems to be in a good mood tonight.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""His shirt..." The lieutenant squin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "His shirt..." The lieutenant squints his eyes, trying to hold back laughter.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...""
You: ""Is it Friday tonight? It feels lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is it Friday tonight? It feels like Friday."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""That's nice, but I don't have anyt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's nice, but I don't have anything to tell you. It's my friend you're looking for, not me."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Gendarmerie! You found me." The yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gendarmerie! You found me." The young man on the balcony gives you a bright smile, before taking another drag from his cigarette.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Beautiful," he replies, smiling. A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Beautiful," he replies, smiling. As he looks at you, something sparkles in his eyes.

fields.Title: You: ""There's something so *different* a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's something so *different* about him that I just can't put my finger on..."

fields.Title: You: ""But I just *found* you again!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But I just *found* you again!"

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Mhmh, that's why I chose this plac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhmh, that's why I chose this place." He looks away, his cigarette end glowing in the dark. "Martinaise is special, isn't it?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "It's laughter!"
fields.Dialogue Text: It's laughter!

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Yeah, it does feel like the end of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, it does feel like the end of the week. Such gentle weather..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wait, suddenly you're *digging* th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, suddenly you're *digging* things?" the lieutenant whispers to you, shaking his head.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""My Sunday friend," he repeats, his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My Sunday friend," he repeats, his smile even wider than before. "He's brilliant, everyone wants to meet my Sunday friend. You'll see."

fields.Title: You: ""There's just something so *mysteri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's just something so *mysterious* about the way he talks and moves..."

fields.Title: You: ""Honestly I'm just trying to not sc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly I'm just trying to not screw anything up."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Beautiful," he says again. A nearb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Beautiful," he says again. A nearby street lamp casts shadows on his chin, drawing out the slender cheekbones.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""His shirt...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "His shirt..."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""We'll talk," the smoker assures yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We'll talk," the smoker assures you, brushing his hand through the hair. "Just not tonight."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Trust me, you do.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Trust me, you do."

fields.Title: Variable["apt.smoker_empathy_laughing"] == true
Variable["apt.smoker_empathy_laughing"] == true
!(Variable["apt.smoker_empathy_laughing"] == true)
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Different, of course.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Different, of course."

fields.Title: You: ""His shirt... why is his shirt alwa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "His shirt... why is his shirt always unbuttoned?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right after you." He nods at the a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right after you." He nods at the apartment door before you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Very*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Very*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who knows, detective? It's a... my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who knows, detective? It's a... mystery," he says, turning his face away from you.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Just look at it..." He gestures to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just look at it..." He gestures towards distant motorways, all leading to golden La Delta. "It's a beautiful night. Who's going to stay in on a night like this?"

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
You: ""I'm not going to make things just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not going to make things just *right*, I'm going to make them *spectacular*."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Then I have some good news for you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then I have some good news for you..." His eyes narrow. A nearby street lamp casts shadows on his chin, drawing out the slender cheekbones.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Take care, alright?" he says with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Take care, alright?" he says with another disarming smile, before slipping off into the night.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He *smells* good..." The lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He *smells* good..." The lieutenant squints his eyes, trying to hold back laughter.

Smoker on the Balcony: ""Besides, I've got to run.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Besides, I've got to run."

fields.Title: You: ""Run where?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Run where?"

fields.Title: You: ""He smells good. Why on earth does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He smells good. Why on earth does he smell so good?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Come on, detective. Let's go -- we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Come on, detective. Let's go -- we've got a potential witness to interview -- his 'Sunday friend', remember?" He nods at the apartment door before you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""His shirt... No, I don't know why..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "His shirt... No, I don't know why his shirt is always unbuttoned." His mouth tightens, as though trying to hold something back.

fields.Title: Empathy: "It feels like a Friday. He seems to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It feels like a Friday. He seems to be in a good mood today.

fields.Title: You: ""Very well, I'll talk to him, but f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very well, I'll talk to him, but first I want to talk to *you*. I have so many questions." (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Somewhere in the distance a baby cr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere in the distance a baby cries over a blasting radio. There's a family argument reaching its crescendo in an upstairs apartment, while around the corner the air conditioners drone.

fields.Title: leave hub
Jump to: [hubble telescope]
Composure: "He's barely holding it together. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's barely holding it together. It's all he can do to keep from bursting out in laughter.

fields.Title: You: ""Only if you promise that we'll tal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Only if you promise that we'll talk again. It's *important*."

fields.Title: Drama: "He's trying to dive deep into the m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's trying to dive deep into the mysteries of his *shirt*!

Smoker on the Balcony: ""Don't worry, we'll meet again." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry, we'll meet again." He gently rests his hand on your shoulder. "Come find me in the bar of the Whirling some evening."

fields.Title: You: ""Why would I want to meet your frie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why would I want to meet your friend?"

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""So tell me, are you here to make t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So tell me, are you here to make things *right* again?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "And he's gone again. Looks like it'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And he's gone again. Looks like it's becoming a theme for him.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's go, Kim. We have to intervie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's go, Kim. We have to interview his Sunday friend." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Empathy: "There, he's laughing again!"
fields.Dialogue Text: There, he's laughing again!

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Even the rain feels nice." He lean..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Even the rain feels nice." He leans over the railing and sticks out his hand to feel the rain.

IsNighttime()

Smoker on the Balcony: ""To the city." He gestures idly tow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To the city." He gestures idly towards distant motorways. "It's a beautiful night."

fields.Title: Shivers: "A man on high heels stumbles out of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A man on high heels stumbles out of a basement club, music blasting over the entire district. It's chilly, and as the chemicals hit his nervous system a thousand shivers ripple through his body.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Something so mysterious about the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Something so mysterious about the way he talks..." The lieutenant squints his eyes, trying to hold back laughter.

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Alright, go then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, go then."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: "He takes another drag of his unfilt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He takes another drag of his unfiltered cigarette and looks around. It's getting dark and the neighbouring windows have lit up one by one.

fields.Title: Untitled hub (05)
You: ""He's such a good listener, I liked..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's such a good listener, I liked talking to him."

fields.Title: You: ""He's always leaving... Why is he a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's always leaving... Why is he always leaving, Kim?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Something flutters in the corner of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something flutters in the corner of the lieutenant's mouth as you're saying those words.

fields.Title: You: ""I got your hint. Found the key rig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I got your hint. Found the key right under that stone."
fields.Alternate1: "We got your hint. Found the key right under that stone."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, who exactly is visiting you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, who exactly is visiting you?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, the cleaning lady let me in...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, the cleaning lady let me in. She also led me to your apartment."
fields.Alternate1: "Yes, the cleaning lady let us in."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "And his shirt is still unbuttoned."
fields.Dialogue Text: And his shirt is still unbuttoned.

fields.Title: You: ""Go, if you must, I don't care. I d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Go, if you must, I don't care. I don't care about people leaving me all the time."

fields.Title: Composure: "Something tells you you're never go..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something tells you you're never going to talk to an individual this cool or mysterious ever again.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""My Sunday friend is visiting me to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My Sunday friend is visiting me tonight. I told him about you and he'd like to say hello. Step in, he's already waiting." He nods towards door #28.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You liked talking to him..." The l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You liked talking to him..." The lieutenant squints his eyes, trying to hold back laughter.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He smells good and that's weird.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "He smells good and that's weird."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "He's going to leave you alone again..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's going to leave you alone again. That's sad.

fields.Title: You: "(Ignore his question.) "I was hopin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Ignore his question.) "I was hoping to talk to a possible witness. Your balcony overlooks the murder scene."

fields.Dialogue Text: Downstairs a cat crosses the yard, disappearing into the bush.
